column5: What's everyone fishing for the big opening weekend?
...family wedding next week-end..grrrrr
I guess that would be other
One of them thar southern polls, is it?  Add another weekend and I'll be backlake fishing for walleye.
I'll make a change for you northerners, hold on one sec...
Walleye if all goes to plan. Wouldn't mind trying Simcoe whities, but she'd have to be a calm day for my boat.
No bass yet in zone 11. Your thinking WAY up north.  It's specs and year-round species for us until the long weekend.
One more change then...
hahaha. Well, that narrows down my choices.
Binbrook Crappie Derby for me. I stay away from openers.
A couple of weeks to wait for pike & walleye opener (May 18th) over here   For now and the next couple of weeks.... Trout

ill be walleye fishing the trent..Will also be float fishing the big pike with large sucker minnows while I sit in a lawn chair sucking back beer at an abnormal rate..lol   Have a long weekend before the long weekend! Sooo excited and cant dang wait...
I,ll stop by friday, to pick up the keys to the boat Roger. Nothing sadder then seeing a boat sitting.   Im a waiting, a pm, for a whitefish/laker fish.
No definite plans, but I'd like to give them walleyed buggers a try.

Just bought a trailer on Kashagawigamog, if i can get it in place, and the deck leveled, might get out on Sunday  - with the new trailer, and boat, and truck, THIS has to have been the LONGEST short winter in my life. Can't wait to catch every fish in those 5 lakes at least twice
Walleye. There will be plenty of time to catch incidental pike once musky opens up.
Oncall next weekend unfortunately.  Although the weekend after it's giant snakes and lakers!

WHAT!?! No carp guys at all? I can't go far, so I'll either be hitting the mouth of Etobicoke Creek or the Ganny. I just bought 270 pounds of bait . . .   maize, chicken scratch, dry mollasses & bread crumbs. Plus some strawberry Koolaid and anise to soak the corn in . . .   when the carp smell that, they come right up the boat ramp lookin' for it!
Just like Troutjunkie... be the 3rd Saturday as an opener for me.. .and it looks like I may even get to the lake for same.... Fishing it daily until October!! (if I bother to get out of bed!)
Walleye on Percy Boom ( Trent river ) ill be the guy in the old bass tracker if anyone is around.
Where's everyone going?
Family then work next weekend......happy hunting everyone!  Weekend after next though i will be on Lac Seul and in front of the house...hopefully SCHLAMMIN' WALTERS!
I'll be out on Rainy River and Rainy Lake. Heading up to Mainville in 2 weeks as well
